description: This file defines the WebsiteTools class, which provides methods to add websites to knowledge bases and to read website content, integrating with other components like Document, KnowledgeBase, and WebsiteReader.

classes.name: WebsiteTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for managing website-related knowledge base operations and reading website content.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the WebsiteTools with an optional knowledge base, setting up appropriate tools based on the type of knowledge base.

methods.name: add_website_to_knowledge_base
methods.description: Adds a website URL to a WebsiteKnowledgeBase and loads its content.

methods.name: add_website_to_combined_knowledge_base
methods.description: Adds a website URL to a source within a CombinedKnowledgeBase and loads its content.

methods.name: read_url
methods.description: Reads the content of a website URL and returns the relevant documents as a JSON string.
